TEXT.S:
= Alpha Condé(·) = Alpha Condé (kngkawas 1938 idas 3 diyax 4-) kiya ka seyjicya Guinea, kndadax kngkawas 2010 idas 12 psdhuwan phiyu soto Guinea. MnAfrika Ryeynmong cusi uri (kngkawas 2017 idas 1 diyax 30 wada mangal). Hiya pa dmuwi 20 knkawas hantay brah soto Lansana Conté, kiya ka hantay tang Guineas Jnmin Ryeynmong cusi. Mniq kngkawas 2010 kcka soto knbeyhing seyngkyo cida, wada balay mniq tumn2 meytaq hyo cida mbiyax mangal soto Guineas; kiya mi mniq kngkawas 2015 ka wada mangal soto Dungan.
Taxa kndusan niya Alpha Condé pa wada mangal qridin das, niqan taxa laqi niya snaw, wa mniq Amirika muyas ka saya.
